Intent: Quick action search with keyboard-first interaction
Web: Modal overlay with Command component, dimmed backdrop, centered placement
Electron: Floating BrowserWindow with vibrancy, spotlight-style, appears above all windows
SwiftUI: .sheet with .searchable() modifier, native iOS search experience
React Native: Modal with FlatList, custom keyboard handling, react-native-modal
Flutter: showDialog with TextField and ListView, Material search pattern
Accessibility: Focus trap, arrow key navigation, typeahead filtering, Escape to close

Intent: Primary hierarchical app navigation always visible
Web: Collapsible sidebar with ResizablePanelGroup, fixed position, hover to expand
Electron: Frameless window side panel, persisted width, system-native resize handle
React Native: DrawerLayoutAndroid or custom View with Animated width, react-navigation drawer
Flutter: NavigationDrawer or permanent Drawer widget, Rail for collapsed state
Accessibility: role='navigation' landmark, arrow key between items, current page indicator

Intent: Top-level section switching for flat hierarchy
Web: Tabs component at top or shadcn TabsList, underline or pill indicator
Electron: Bottom toolbar or top tab bar, consistent with web, keyboard navigable
SwiftUI: TabView with .tabViewStyle(.page), native iOS tab bar at bottom
React Native: createBottomTabNavigator from react-navigation, safe area handling
Flutter: BottomNavigationBar widget with NavigationDestination, Material 3 style
Accessibility: role='tablist', aria-selected, automatic activation on arrow keys

Intent: Show and navigate hierarchical location in content
Web: Breadcrumb component with BreadcrumbLink, separator customizable
Electron: Same as web implementation, follows content area not window
SwiftUI: NavigationStack with path binding, programmatic back navigation
React Native: Custom Breadcrumb component with Pressable links, flat hierarchy display
Flutter: Breadcrumbs widget or custom Row with TextButtons, overflow handling
Accessibility: aria-label='breadcrumb', current page aria-current='page', linked items

Intent: Return to previous screen or context
Web: Browser history or react-router navigate(-1), breadcrumb back link
Electron: BrowserWindow navigation, globalShortcut for Cmd+[, custom back button
Flutter: Navigator.pop(context), WillPopScope for confirmation, AppBar leading
Accessibility: Escape key shortcut, back button label describes destination

Web: Pagination component with PaginationLink, ellipsis for large ranges
Electron: Same as web, keyboard shortcuts for next/prev (Cmd+Arrow)
SwiftUI: Custom pagination with Button group, no native equivalent
React Native: FlatList with onEndReached, or custom Pagination component
Flutter: Pagination widget or PageView with PageController, dots indicator
Accessibility: aria-label for navigation, current page announcement, disabled states

Web: Custom Stepper with step indicators, linear or non-linear progression
Electron: Same as web, progress persisted in electron-store across sessions
SwiftUI: Custom stepper using ProgressView or custom step indicators
React Native: Step component from react-native-paper or custom implementation
Flutter: Stepper widget with Step children, horizontal or vertical orientation
Accessibility: aria-current='step', step completion status, error states announced

Intent: Jump to sections within long content
Trigger: Click on table of contents link
Web: ScrollArea with id targets, smooth scroll behavior CSS
Electron: Same as web, smooth scrolling, scroll spy for active section
SwiftUI: ScrollViewReader with scrollTo, programmatic scroll to anchor
React Native: ScrollView with scrollTo ref method, custom anchor tracking
Accessibility: Skip links for keyboard, focus management after jump, scroll position

Intent: Find and navigate to content via search
Web: Command component as search, or Input with search results dropdown
Electron: Spotlight-style search window, global Cmd+F triggers search mode
SwiftUI: .searchable() modifier on List, NavigationLink in search results
React Native: SearchBar component with FlatList results, react-native-search-bar
Flutter: SearchBar widget with SearchDelegate, showSearch function
Accessibility: Search role, aria-expanded for results, live region for result count

Web: ContextMenu with ContextMenuItem, positioned at cursor
Electron: Native Menu integration via electron Menu.popup, context-aware items
SwiftUI: .contextMenu modifier with Button actions, native iOS context menu
React Native: Custom context menu or react-native-context-menu-view, long press trigger
Flutter: PopupMenuButton widget, showMenu for custom positioning
Accessibility: menu role, menuitem role, arrow navigation, Escape to close

Intent: Frequently used actions accessible from anywhere
Web: DropdownMenu from floating action button, or Command palette section
Electron: Tray menu with recent actions, global shortcuts registered
SwiftUI: Shortcuts app integration, keyboard shortcuts in menu bar
React Native: Floating action button with speed dial, react-native-fab
Flutter: FloatingActionButton with SpeedDial pattern, or BottomSheet actions
Accessibility: Keyboard shortcut labels visible, action descriptions for screen readers

Intent: Compact primary navigation for larger screens
Web: Sidebar variant with icon-only collapsed state, tooltip labels
Electron: Vertical toolbar at window edge, icons only, hover for labels
SwiftUI: Custom rail using VStack with Buttons, no native equivalent
React Native: Custom NavigationRail component, icons with optional labels
Flutter: NavigationRail widget, destinations with icons and labels
Accessibility: role='navigation', tooltips for icon-only, keyboard navigable
